twist

A bunch of flexible mixins, using Sass/Compass.

toggle

Buttons

Buttons are simply made by using the element mixin.

.button-default
.button-primary
.button-secondary
.button-tertiary
.button-neutral

Alert

Buttons are simply made by using the element mixin.

Default

Some really unimportant information like a cookie bar.

.alert-default

Red

Some kind of error happened, action needs taking.

.alert-red

Green

Something updated successfully.

.alert-green

Blue

Something that may be of interest to you.

.alert-blue

Yellow

Caution take care when doing such a thing.

.alert-yellow

Forms

Form fields are simply made by using the form mixin.

Grid

The grid is setup by using the grid mixin.

.grid-1
.grid-5
.grid-2
.grid-2
.grid-2
.grid-2
.grid-4
.grid-3
.grid-3
.grid-1
.grid-1
.grid-1
.grid-1
.grid-1
.grid-1
.grid-6

Table

The grid is setup by using the table-styled mixin.

Table Caption
Table heading
Table footer
Table cell

twist, free to use as you please.
